ThermalState.description:
Represents the thermal state of a fluid with specific properties.

Parameters
----------
type_name : typing.Literal['ThermalState'] = ThermalState
        private_attribute_constructor : <class 'str'> = default
        private_attribute_input_cache : <class 'flow360.component.simulation.operating_condition.ThermalStateCache'> = ThermalStateCache(altitude=None, temperature_offset=None, temperature=None, density=None, material=None)
        temperature : <class 'flow360.component.simulation.unit_system._Constrained'> = 288.15 K
        density : <class 'flow360.component.simulation.unit_system._Constrained'> = 1.225 kg/m**3
        material : <class 'flow360.component.simulation.models.material.Air'> = Air(type='air', name='air', dynamic_viscosity=Sutherland(reference_viscosity=unyt_quantity(1.716e-05,, 'Pa*s'),, reference_temperature=unyt_quantity(273.15,, 'K'),, effective_temperature=unyt_quantity(110.4,, 'K')))
    
Attributes:
-----------
temperature : TemperatureType.Positive
    The temperature of the fluid, initialized to 288.15 K. This field is frozen and should not be modified after
    construction.
density : DensityType.Positive
    The density of the fluid, initialized to 1.225 kg/m^3. This field is frozen and should not be modified after
    construction.
material : FluidMaterialTypes
    The type of fluid material, initialized to Air(). This field is frozen and should not be modified after
    construction.
ThermalState.title: ThermalState
